name: Happy Chaos Theorem Of Irrelevance (ALPHA)
description:
Happy Chaos Theorem Of Irrelevance is a fast paced 2D platformer/shooter starring you, a special agent rabbit stuck inside of a simulation by an evil A.I. bent on enslaving the world. This is an early version of the game which I originally thought I had lost, so now I'm posting it here to share with all of you and to make sure it doesn't get lost again.

Special thanks to the DSR squad,  and everyone that supports my games.  🐺
